I sleep 8 hours.
I prefer texting over phone calls.
I love hockey.
My mother looks after my grandmother.
I use the computer all day.

participant_2.background:
I love to travel.
My favourite food is ice cream.
My parents are divorced.
I work as a construction worker during the summers.
I am a college student.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel, I love to try new things, and I love to meet new people.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm more of a homebody, but I like to go out and explore new places every now and then.
I'm a little bit of both. I like to stay in and relax, but I also love to get out and experience new things.
What's your favorite place you've ever traveled to?
I think my favorite place was Paris. It was so beautiful and there was so much to see and do.
I've heard Paris is amazing! I've always wanted to go there.
You should definitely go! It's definitely worth it.
I will! What's your favorite food?
Ice cream! I love all kinds of ice cream, but my favorite is probably chocolate chip cookie dough.
I love ice cream too! I could eat it every day.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too! What are you studying in college?
I'm studying business. I want to be an entrepreneur one day.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll be a great entrepreneur.
Thanks! I hope so.
So, what do you do for work during the summers?
I work as a construction worker. I like it because it's a lot of physical activity and I get to be outside.
That sounds like a cool job! I've always been a little bit afraid of heights, so I don't think I could do that job.
It's not for everyone, but it's a lot of fun.
It sounds like you have a lot of interests and hobbies.
I do! I like to keep busy.
That's good! I'm glad you're happy.
Thanks! I am.
